mapper.sql: id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, order_id, phone, store_id, store_name, goods_name, number, refund_money, after_sale_type, reason, status, goods_type, pictures, refund_id
mapper.select: select id goodsTempId, name,icon,real_pay_money,standard_str,number from om_goods_temp where order_id=(select order_id from om_goods_temp where id=#{id}) and del_flag=0 and can_after_sale=1

SELECT o.id, t.`name` goodsName, t.icon picture, t.standard_str, t.number, o.`status`, o.after_sale_type type FROM om_after_sale_order o, om_goods_temp t WHERE o.create_by = #{userId}
AND t.id = o.goods_temp_id AND o.del_flag = 0 AND t.del_flag = 0 order by o.update_time desc
select `node`,`describes`,create_time from om_after_sale_log where del_flag=0 and after_sale_order_id=#{afterSaleOrderId} order by create_time

SELECT after_sale_type afterSaleTypeEnum, STATUS afterSaleStatusEnum, l.create_time operatingTime, l.node, o.reason, o.refund_money, o.number, o.create_time applyTime, o.id afterSaleOrderId, t.`name` goodsName, t.icon picture, t.standard_str, t.real_pay_money maxRefundMoney
FROM om_after_sale_order o, om_after_sale_log l, om_goods_temp t WHERE o.del_flag = 0 AND l.del_flag = 0 AND t.del_flag = 0 AND t.id = o.goods_temp_id AND o.id = l.after_sale_order_id AND l.create_time = ( SELECT MAX( create_time ) FROM om_after_sale_log l2 WHERE l2.after_sale_order_id = #{afterSaleOrderId} )

SELECT o.id afterOrderId, t.`name` name, t.icon , t.standard_str, t.real_pay_money realPayMoney, t.number, o.reason, o.refund_money, o.pictures, l.describes describes, oo.status orderStatus
FROM om_after_sale_order o, om_after_sale_log l, om_goods_temp t, om_order oo WHERE o.del_flag = 0 AND l.del_flag = 0 AND t.del_flag = 0 and oo.del_flag=0 AND t.id = o.goods_temp_id AND o.id = l.after_sale_order_id and o.order_id=oo.id and l.after_sale_order_id=#{afterSaleOrderId} AND l.create_time = ( SELECT MAX( create_time ) FROM om_after_sale_log l2 WHERE l2.after_sale_order_id = #{afterSaleOrderId} )
